name: Sausage Strike Force
description:
Sausage Strike Force is a "decreasing" shoot them up in which you lose power ups along the game.

Weenie, the friendly hotdog, is fighting his way into the junk food universe to reach the top of the food chain.

The following content may contain excessive ketchup and violent mustard. Accordingly viewer discretion is advised.

WARNING THE RELATED CONTENT MAY BE DISTURBING TO YOUR DIET

9/10 ­ Fine Cooking Magazine ­ " hot & spicy !"

5 stars ­ The Art of Eating ­ "would eat again"

4 forks ­ Acquired Taste ­ those damn sushis !

Team
